title: Sophisticated Academic Writing: Argumentation

vocab.definition: Persuasive techniques including ethos, pathos, and logos
Acknowledging validity in an opposing argument
Disproving or challenging an opposing argument
A logical argument with a major premise, minor premise, and conclusion

teachingNotes: Teach sophisticated argumentative techniques and logical structures. Identify and avoid common logical fallacies.
